Hero.title: We are the Shahbandar of the seed market
Hero.description: From Nile Valley farms to desert reclamation projects — our seeds power the future of sustainable agriculture.

About.title: About <green>Us</green>
About.description: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> is a leading Egyptian company in seed and crop production, backed by decades of agricultural expertise and innovation. Since 1995, we've grown to serve farmers across Egypt and Africa with high-yield varieties and trusted research. Our vision is to cultivate a leading position in the seed industry across Egypt, the Arab world, and Africa. We are driven by a commitment to progress and scientific discovery, ensuring the highest quality seeds for optimal productivity.

1.text: To make our Shahbandar brand synonymous with quality and reliability throughout Egypt.

2.text: To extend our reach to markets across the Arab world and African nations.

3.text: To consistently enhance our existing products and introduce new, market-relevant varieties every two years or less.

4.text: To leverage the latest market research to refine our services and product offerings.

5.text: To provide tailored seed solutions that support Egypt's agricultural expansion into new territories.

1.title: Uncompromising Quality
1.text: We adhere to international standards to ensure the highest quality in every seed we produce.

2.title: Scientific Excellence
2.text: We are dedicated to rigorous scientific research to continuously improve our products.

3.title: Empowering Our Partners
3.text: We are committed to supporting traders, companies, and farmers with expert guidance and technical assistance.

4.title: Extensive Market Presence
4.text: We strive to reach every customer in Egypt and expand our presence throughout Arab and African markets.

5.title: Customer-Centric Approach
5.text: Our work is driven by a deep understanding and focuses on the needs of our customers.

sublist.1: The <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seed Production Company logo visually communicates its core business and values.
sublist.2: A thriving green plant, its upper leaf catching the sunlight, represents growth, vitality, and the quality of their agricultural products, essential for sustainable agriculture.
sublist.3: Intertwined roots symbolize the company's strong foundation, its connection to the land, and its commitment to building lasting customer relationships.
sublist.4: The encompassing circle signifies unity, the cyclical nature of agriculture, and their dedication to sustainable practices.
sublist.5: The logo's color palette reinforces this message: shades of green evoke nature and prosperity, while the brown of the roots represents the earth and natural resources.
sublist.6: This distinctive and memorable design reflects <bold>Shahbandar</bold>'s aim to expand globally, serve their customers effectively, and foster deep, enduring relationships, all while championing high-quality, sustainable agricultural production. The modern, simple design ensures its effectiveness across international markets.

1.title: Production
1.text: Our Production Department oversees the cultivation of foundational seeds at our extensive research farm in Farafra and on contracted lands with trusted partners nationwide. Their core mission is to ensure the safety and quality of all seeds, meeting precise planting specifications. Our team comprises Egypt's leading seed production engineers, bringing vast experience from international companies.

2.title: Research and Development
2.text: This vital department is the engine of our innovation. We continuously test seeds against rigorous international standards and spearhead the development of exclusive new varieties for both local and global markets. Our R&D team includes top Egyptian agricultural academics holding advanced degrees and extensive practical experience.

3.title: Sales and Marketing
3.text: More than just sales, this department drives our market understanding. They analyze sales data, consumer behavior, and global trends to strategically position our current and future products. Our team consists of highly qualified sales engineers with deep local market knowledge, strong agricultural technical expertise, and proven marketing and sales acumen.

4.title: Silos and Warehouses
4.text: Our company is a pioneer in seed storage, being among the first to own dedicated grain and seed silos. With a capacity of up to 3,000 tons, these facilities ensure optimal preservation throughout the year, streamlining our production process. We also operate multiple Ministry of Agriculture-licensed warehouses strategically located for efficient distribution across Egypt and to facilitate international exports according to global standards.

5.title: Refrigeration
5.text: To guarantee the quality of our final product, especially in warmer climates, we maintain substantial refrigeration facilities at our main center in Aswan. This ensures optimal preservation and maintains the excellent qualities of our seeds for high productivity.

6.title: Administration
6.text: Our dedicated administrative team ensures seamless transactions for our clients, facilitating efficient logistical access to our products. This department encompasses Accounts, Human Resources, Transportation, and Secretarial Affairs, all operating under our core value of customer focus.

Products.title: Our <green>Products</green>
Products.description: We offer a comprehensive range of high-quality seeds tailored to Egypt's diverse agricultural seasons and needs.

1.title: Summer Seeds
1.text: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seeds Company is a leading producer of summer crop seeds, featuring premium varieties of corn, as our corn seed production is a cornerstone of our summer offerings. We proudly feature proprietary varieties, including the high-performing 167 Single-Cross Hybrid Yellow (formerly a key Ministry of Agriculture variety, now exclusively ours), the robust triple hybrid 353 (also exclusive), and our distinct 130 Single-Cross Hybrid. Additionally, we offer trusted Ministry of Agriculture corn varieties such as 168, 368, and 321, alongside promising new single and triple hybrids currently under development by our dedicated Corn Research Department. We also produce premium varieties of rice, soybeans, and sesame.

2.title: Winter Seeds
2.text: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seeds provides a wide selection of winter crop seeds, with a strong emphasis on Egypt's renowned wheat varieties. Our portfolio includes many of the Ministry of Agriculture's high-yielding and well-established options, such as Misr 1, Misr 3, Misr 4, Sakha 95 and 96, Giza 171, Beni Suef 5, Seds 12, Seds 14, and Gemmayza 11, among others. Looking ahead, our Research and Development department is actively developing a unique wheat variety specifically adapted to Egyptian and African climates. This initiative aims to position <bold>Shahbandar</bold> as a global leader in providing highly productive and disease-resistant Egyptian wheat. Our winter seed offerings also include: barley, alfalfa, fava beans, peas and other winter-suitable crops.

3.title: Seeds
3.text: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> provides a diverse selection of vegetable seeds specifically chosen for optimal performance in Egyptian climates. These seeds are readily available through our extensive distribution network across Egypt, as well as through <bold>Shahbandar</bold> branches and distribution partners in Arab and African countries.

Clients.title: Our <green>Clients</green>
Clients.description: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seeds has earned a strong reputation for quality and reliability, making us a trusted partner for a diverse range of clients.

1.title: Government Entities
1.text: Our commitment to providing high-quality seeds has established strong relationships with key government entities involved in agricultural development. We proudly supply agricultural extension centers and agricultural reform branches across all Egyptian governorates, as well as public sector agricultural production companies.

2.title: Major Companies
2.text: In Egypt's key agricultural development zones – including Toshka, El-Oweinat, El-Wahat, New Valley, and the Dabaa Axis – <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seed is the preferred supplier for numerous leading companies. These include esteemed organizations such as:

3.title: Top Traders
3.text: Our high-quality corn seeds are readily accessible through a widespread network of reputable agricultural seed traders throughout Egypt. From Lower and Upper Egypt to major agricultural hubs like Nubaria, Wadi El Natrun, Salhia, New Valley, Toshka, and El Oweinat, our products are available where you need them.

4.title: International Exports
4.text: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Seed has successfully entered international markets, beginning with strong partnerships with traders in Algeria who rely on our Egyptian corn seeds. Our export reach has expanded to West African nations like Senegal and Mali. To better serve East Africa, we have established a new company in Uganda. We also proudly export to other Arab countries, including Sudan and Syria, and are actively pursuing further expansion across the Arab and African continents.

Contact.title: Contact <green>Us</green>
Contact.description: For inquiries, please reach out to us at:

Footer.slogan: We are the Shahbandar of the seed market

list.Address: Alghunaima, Western Desert Road, Edfu - Aswan, Arab Republic of Egypt

brief.p1: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> Company has been a leading force in Egyptian agriculture since its establishment in 1995. Initially specializing in grain and crop production, our commitment to growth led us to expand into seed production in 2004.
brief.p2: Our unwavering dedication to innovation is embodied by our vital Research and Development Department. This team is the engine behind the <bold>Shahbandar</bold> brand, consistently developing superior agricultural solutions.
brief.p4: We pride ourselves on our exclusive portfolio of high-performing corn varieties, including 167 Single-Cross Hybrid Yellow and 353 Three- way Cross Hybrid Yellow. We also offer a range of other trusted corn seeds developed by the Ministry of Agriculture.
brief.p5: <bold>Shahbandar</bold> is a key producer of all high-quality wheat strains developed by the Ministry of Agriculture, offering over ten varieties renowned for their yield and reliability. Our strong market share reflects our commitment to providing Egyptian farmers with the best wheat seeds available. Our agricultural expertise extends to barley, alfalfa, fava beans, soybeans, rice, and other important crops.
brief.p6: Scientific research is paramount at <bold>Shahbandar</bold>. Our team of specialized researchers is dedicated to advancing corn production and other crops, ensuring practical benefits for Egyptian farmers and enhancing the global standing of Egyptian agricultural products. We are also excited about our new varieties currently under registration. Uniquely in Egypt, <bold>Shahbandar</bold> invests in superior seed storage with our own silos and a dedicated refrigeration facility in Aswan, guaranteeing the quality and longevity of our seeds.
brief.p7: Our commitment to the local market is evident in our presence across all Egyptian governorates, supported by a strong network of agents and trusted partnerships with major agricultural companies who rely on <bold>Shahbandar</bold> for their seed needs. Internationally, the <bold>Shahbandar</bold> brand is recognized in over eight African nations, a testament to our quality and reliability.
brief.p8: We are dedicated to protecting our brand and the trust of our farmers through a robust administrative system that actively combats commercial fraud and counterfeiting. Our production engineers provide invaluable technical support to companies and farmers, including establishing demonstration fields to showcase best practices.
brief.p9: Our dynamic marketing and sales department utilizes in-depth market analysis to strategically develop our product line, introduce new innovations, and empower our traders to effectively reach farmers throughout Egypt with practical, science-backed strategies.
